For most programmes supplementary feeding refers to children, though occasionally may include 
women (e.g. in Ethiopia and Mexico). Counselling is considered to be community-based, rather 
than promotion via media. Growth monitoring is included as an operational programme component, 
but by itself has no efficacy. Micronutrient supplementation does not include fortification, since
